name: Long-Sleeved Capilene® Cool Daily Shirt - Women's

features: Set-in sleeves for enhanced movement and fit
Stretch fabric provides enhanced comfort during activities both in and out of water
Made with miDori™ bioSoft for added wicking and softness, and HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control to keep things fresh
Minimal stitching and seams to help reduce chafe during movement

Solids: 3.7-oz 100% recycled polyester jersey. Heathers and cross-dyes: 3.7-oz 100% polyester (50% recycled) jersey. All with miDori™ bioSoft for added wicking and softness, HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control and sun protection. Fabric is certified as bluesign® approved. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
